## PropertyChangeNotifier.notify() method

Notifies all subscribers, based on the specified property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
notify(propertyName: string): void;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

propertyName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The property name, passed along to subscribers during notification.

</tbody></table>

void
